column4: what is the stongest program available for data recovery on linux ext2 / 3 filesystems?
testdisk is one.. don't know if it's the "stongest"
if you've installed an os on top of it I doubt you'll find much to recover
very possible.. give it a try and see what you find.. but expect a lot of hard work.. it won't be "save *.mp3 in this folder"
